entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
